Articles.Content:
I have seen a couple of recent threads asking for new vessel types, and I have thought of a fairly simple solution that would solve any similar issue: allow people to choose between various vessel icons and give their vessel a customised classification. Things would probably still default to the current options (like debris) but I feel like it would be good to add in the ability to personalise the classification of a vessel as well as just its name. Therefore people could reclassify things to "spaceplane" or "decommissioned vessel" or similar without having to ask for a new classification for each one.

Additionally, another useful feature along the same train of thought would be a search function in the tracking station that can search either by name or by vessel classification. I know you can narrow down what you see already, but for people who have a lot of flights at once it would be useful to be able to be more specific.
I don't know why SQUAD hasn't implemented this yet, it solves this issue for everyone!

Simple answers are often best.

Simple for us I mean, maybe not so simple for squad. Then again there are already one or two expandable array of buttons in the game so half the work has been done for another.
